extracted-table.table-caption: Group difference in age for the minimum/maximum DTI-derived measures based on analysis of the Poisson model and TBSS.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: These data were tested as significant group difference with independent t-test using FDR correction with q value 0.05. SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy; MD: mean diffusivity; Da: axial diffusivity; Dr: Radial diffusivity.

caption.p: Group difference in age for the minimum/maximum DTI-derived measures based on analysis of the Poisson model and TBSS.

table-wrap-foot.p: These data were tested as significant group difference with independent t-test using FDR correction with q value 0.05. SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy; MD: mean diffusivity; Da: axial diffusivity; Dr: Radial diffusivity.

extracted-table.table-caption: Group difference in the minimum/maximum DTI-derived measures based on analysis of the Poisson model and TBSS.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: These data were tested as significant group difference with independent t-test using FDR correction with q value 0.05 (*). SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy; MD: mean diffusivity; Da: axial diffusivity; Dr: Radial diffusivity.

caption.p: Group difference in the minimum/maximum DTI-derived measures based on analysis of the Poisson model and TBSS.

table-wrap-foot.p: These data were tested as significant group difference with independent t-test using FDR correction with q value 0.05 (*). SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy; MD: mean diffusivity; Da: axial diffusivity; Dr: Radial diffusivity.

extracted-table.table-caption: FA group difference at ages from 6 to 24 months.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: The data were tested with a two-way ANOVA and post-hoc analysis with significant level of p < 0.05 (*). SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy.

caption.p: FA group difference at ages from 6 to 24 months.

table-wrap-foot.p: The data were tested with a two-way ANOVA and post-hoc analysis with significant level of p < 0.05 (*). SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy.

extracted-table.table-caption: FA group difference at ages from 30 to 48 months.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: The data were tested with a two-way ANOVA and post-hoc analysis with significant level of p < 0.05 (*). SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy.

caption.p: FA group difference at ages from 30 to 48 months.

table-wrap-foot.p: The data were tested with a two-way ANOVA and post-hoc analysis with significant level of p < 0.05 (*). SD: standard derivation. FA: fractional anisotropy.
